artist: Artist: Serge Lunal; Artist: Christian Prigent; Publisher: Cadex Éditions, France
description: softbound facsimile edition (i.e., a trade book) with the addition of a possibly unique artist-painted presentation cover of white heavy watercolor paper with blue, yellow, and pink acrylic; included inside is a white sheath containing two hand-painted clear plastic sheets; lender's archive #078
dimension:
Cover: 9 x 6-11/16 x 3/16 in.
Painted enclosures: 9 x 13 in. (open)
medium: Acrylic painting on presentation cover and two enclosures
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed:
Presentation cover: signed in pencil by the artist on front inside flap: Serge Lunal;  dated in pencil on back inside flap: [Juin?] 01
Acrylic enclosures on clear film: one is annotated C and signed in blue: Lunal - Mai 2001.; the other is annoted  A [underlined] and inscribed in blue: A la Dublineuse.
title: À la Dublineuse
